original_title: Image of God or Planet of the Apes
overview: Will the missing link ever be found? In this engaging talk, Dr. David Dewitt offers a resounding “No!” In his presentation from Answers in Genesis Creation Library Series, this respected Ph.D. professor reveals information about DNA, human/ape skull comparisons, and supposed apeman discoveries to critique the evolutionary tree that supposedly links humans to apes. Using well-documented research and revealing illustrations, he exposes its roots for what they really are— as fictional as Planet of the Apes.
title: Image of God or Planet of the Apes
